alert.note: Alert for Donley; Gray; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 07 at 3:36AM CST until November 07 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. * Affected Area...In Texas...Roberts...Gray and Donley. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 5 * Timing...Critical fire weather conditions will start around noon and end around 6 PM CST Tuesday
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
